title: Horror Games Music Pack
description: An unparalleled collection of spine-chilling music soundtracks. Complete with 15 original full-ending themes and related loops, and intros for horror video games.
longDescription:
Introducing the Horror Music Pack for Unity: a bone-chilling collection of 15 original themes that will send shivers down your players' spines. Immerse them in the eerie and macabre with our carefully crafted compositions, perfect for horror video games and spine-tingling experiences.


Demos of the main versions of all the tracks included in the pack are available below:



| TRACKLIST PREVIEW


Whether you're crafting a dreadful storyline, amplifying jump-scare moments, or immersing players in a world of terror, the Horror Music Pack is your gateway to unparalleled fear-inducing soundscapes. Elevate your scary game with multiple tracks in different styles for different levels of goosebumps: from orchestral music to Jazz, 80's retro Synthwave and quirky Hip-hop.


You can also use this music to promote your video game on Youtube and all the other social platforms. Fill out our form to clear any Content ID claim on your promotional videos: https://www.pinegroove.net/content_id_release_form/


INCLUDED WITH THIS PACK:


  • 15 unique music themes with elaborate full-length structures;
  • 66 WAV files, including full-length versions, loops and intro/outros;
  • 1 hour and 16 minutes of audio in 16 bit / 44.1 Khz format


🎵 Welcome to Transylvania: Eerie orchestral blend - trembling strings, ghostly choirs, haunted harpsichord.

🎵 Spooky Waltz: Mysterious music-box, ghostly theremin, skeletal harpsichord create a sinister mood.

🎵 Horror Ambience: Melancholic piano, dark pads, tense strings - a backdrop for haunted tales.

🎵 Stranger Vibes: Dark 80s retrowave - pulsing synths.

🎵 Creepy Tales: Eerie, quirky, slightly grotesque soundtrack.

🎵 Hostile Alien Planet: Vintage sci-fi horror - theremin, dissonances, thrilling effects.

🎵 Halloween Masquerade: Sinister orchestral horror, eerie music-box, ghostly synths.

🎵 Midnight Encounters: Suspenseful Halloween track with a quirky, inquisitive feel.

🎵 Halloween Show: Gloomy, dissonant march with a spooky atmosphere.

🎵 Strange Hip Hop: Quirky mix of orchestra and funky beats.

🎵 Spying Operation: Cinematic suspense with rhythmic percussion, grave piano, thrilling effects.

🎵 Danse Macabre: Quirky horror with odd harpsichord, eerie clarinet, ghostly vocals.

🎵 Goblin Nightmare: Retro 80s horror vibes - guitar effects, synths, harpsichord.

🎵 Dark Winter: Eerie orchestral cinematic track.

🎵 Skeletons Dance: Haunting Halloween music with hammering harpsichord, spooky theremin.
technicalDetails:
Included tracks:


  1. Welcome To Transylvania (main theme, 2 loops, 4 stingers)
  2. Spooky Waltz (main theme, 2 loops, 1 stinger)
  3. Horror Ambience (main theme, 2 loops, 1 stinger)
  4. Stranger Vibes (main theme, 2 loops, 1 stinger)
  5. Creepy Tales (main theme, 2 loops, 2 stingers)
  6. Hostile Anlien Planet (2 main themes, 4 loops, 1 stinger)
  7. Halloween Masquerade (main theme, 1 solo, 2 loops, 1 stinger)
  8. Midnight Encounters (main theme, 2 loops, 1 stinger)
  9. Halloween Show (main theme, 2 loops)
  10. Strange Hip Hop (main theme, 2 loops, 1 stinger)
  11. Spying Operation (main theme, 3 loops)
  12. Danse Macabre (main theme, 2 loops, 1 stinger)
  13. Goblin Nightmare (main theme, 2 loops)
  14. Dark Winter (main theme, 2 loops, 1 stinger)
  15. Skeletons Dance (main theme, 3 loops)


Number of Audio Wavs: 66

Number of Audio Cues: 66

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz/16 Bit

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 01:16:00

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Documentation: www.francescobiondimusic.com

Important/Additional Notes: if you want to clear a claim on your Youtube promotional video, please fill this form : https://www.pinegroove.net/content_id_release_form/
